Bind Serpent Fiend

Summon Units:#526 Serpent Fiend
The caster sacrifices several blood slaves to contact and bind a Serpent Fiend. Serpent Fiends are bat-winged, serpent-like demons summoned from the Abyss. Their bite is highly venomous.
